testcase.name: add to cart and change product - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Buyer landing to saucedemo............................................passed Given Buyer login to the saucedemo username standard_user and password secret_sauce.passed When Buyer add a product Sauce Labs Backpack to the cart....................passed And Buyer checkout product1 Sauce Labs Backpack.............................passed And Buyer remove product1 Sauce Labs Backpack from the cart.................passed And Buyer back to home to change product....................................passed And Buyer add a new product Sauce Labs Bike Light to the cart...............passed And Buyer checkout new product Sauce Labs Bike Light........................passed And Buyer insert Jhon Wick 12345 for shipping...............................passed And Buyer see checkout overview new product Sauce Labs Bike Light...........passed Then Buyer will see message confirmation page Thank you for your order!.....passed
